text: Andria "Antri" Christoforou (born 2 April 1992) is a Cypriot professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Women's Continental Team . In 2016, she became the National Champion for Cyprus in both the road race and individual time trial. She was selected to represent Cyprus at the 2016 Summer Olympics. She qualified to represent Cyprus at the 2020 Summer Olympics in the women's road race. ==Major results== ;2010 : 1st 20px Road race, National Road Championships ;2013 : National Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::1st 20px Time trial : 3rd Time Trial, Games of the Small States of Europe ;2014 : 1st Sfendami Mountainbike race : 2nd Lakatamia Mountainbike race ;2016 : National Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::1st 20px Time trial : 1st Arad Dimona Arad : 1st Dead Sea–Scorpion Pass : 3rd Massada Arad ;2017 : 1st 20px Road race, National Road Championships : Games of the Small States of Europe ::1st Time trial ::2nd Cross-country ;2018 : National Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::1st 20px Time trial : 1st VR Women ITT : 3rd Time trial, Mediterranean Games : 6th Overall Tour of Eftalia Hotels & Velo Alanya : 6th Time Trial, Commonwealth Games ;2019 : National Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::1st 20px Time trial :1st Scorpions' Pass Time Trial :7th Chrono Gatineau :8th Grand Prix Cycliste de Gatineau ;2020 : National Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::1st 20px Time trial ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Cypriot female cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of Cyprus Category:Cyclists at the 2010 Summer Youth Olympics Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for Cyprus Category:Cyclists at the 2014 Commonwealth Games Category:Cyclists at the 2018 Commonwealth Games Category:Mediterranean Games bronze medalists for Cyprus Category:Competitors at the 2018 Mediterranean Games Category:Mediterranean Games medalists in cycling Category:European Games competitors for Cyprus Category:Cyclists at the 2019 European Games Category:People from Nicosia District
title: Antri Christoforou
